a bunch of belly-aching about how difficult the only thing we get will be , '' Rep. Thomas Ridge -LRB- R. , Pa. -RRB- , who leads the charge against the practice in the House complains '' The primary purpose of the census is to distribute political power ... not to gather demographic information
